name: Advanced Pong 2
description:
Yep, it's pong!

What simpler way to challenge your friend (you got one of those, right?) than to play a match of PONG!

It's a simple implementation, perfect for when you're very bored all those occasions.

Includes a Homebrew 3DS version, to take this classic on the go.

Attention: Uneven Prankster is not affiliated with Nintendo or subsidiaries. This additional port is not official. Do not send your legal eagle storm after me. Thanks.
